seed_pair.target: She didn't want to tell me where it was.
seed_pair.known: Ella no quería decirme dónde estaba.

S0065: es importante | tomar tiempo | para evaluarte | evaluarte
it's important | to take time | to test yourself | test yourself
S0066: no es difícil | encontrar | la respuesta
it's not difficult | to find | the answer
S0067: por qué | quieres parar | quieres | parar
why | you want to stop | you want | to stop
S0068: what | are you looking for | looking for
S0069: no quería | cuidar | el perro joven | toda la tarde
he didn't want | to look after | the young dog | all afternoon
